WITH ranked_pictures AS ( SELECT fp.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY fp.fp_feedno ORDER BY fp.fp_no ASC) AS rn FROM FEEDPICTURE fp ) SELECT f.f_no AS fpFeedNo, p.fp_no, p.fp_attachtype, p.fp_attachoname FROM feed f LEFT JOIN ranked_pictures p ON f.f_no = p.fp_feedno AND p.rn = 1 WHERE f.f_memberno = #{value}
